page.title: 17ROAD CROSSING PATROL
page.content: In school term time 42 children are helped across dangerous Straight Road, Old Windsor by Mrs.Baker,the Road Crossing Patrol,morning and afternoon. She switches on flashing warning lights at each side of the road ;she crosses at an island.She stops traffic by placing the pole of her circular sign with"STOP-CHILDREN CROSSING"on it on the road facing traffic;she goes to the island,repeats this action;when she tells children to cross they do. She is called "lollipop lady"because her sign is that shape.There have been no accidents at the crossing in 1985; she has to jump out of the way when drivers fail to stop;she says motor- cylists are most dangerous as they are hard to see in busy traffic. UNIFORM:-Black hat,waterproof coat fluorescent yellow bib(Winter);black hat,white coat,fluorescent bib(Summer)
